title: Fragment, late 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of green silk velvet. Cut pile design on uncut ground. Tiny allover pattern of highly formalized flower sprigs in outline.
